htmlBody: It seems like a plausible cause area to me but I am not aware of a lot of EA work on the subject.

OP just joined the forum and has not provided any reason why, given the strong ties of pronatalism to the far-right, this cause is noticeably more pressing than even adjacent causes such as immigration reform. I'd recommend not engaging.

1. Others can put it in better terms than I can : https://worksinprogress.co/issue/natalism-for-progressives
     
  2. While Pronatalist.org can be considered to be on the right with it's obsession with culture and technology.  'Stop Population Decline' stuff has a far more progressive focus in it's articles (https://stoppopulationdecline.org/young-peoples-unhappiness-is-older-generations-fault/)
Yeah, I was wondering about that and wanted to see all of the options
